Package com.yinhai.ta404.core.safe.passwordutil.gm

Class Sm4Util

java.lang.Object
com.yinhai.ta404.core.safe.passwordutil.gm.GmBaseUtil
com.yinhai.ta404.core.safe.passwordutil.gm.Sm4Util
public class Sm4Util extends GmBaseUtil
sm4工具类,对称加密提供密钥产生和ecb的加密解密以及cbc的加密和解密
Version:
1.0
